/** * Base class for services that do not need a thread while "running" * but may need one during startup and shutdown. Subclasses can * implement {@link #startUp} and {@link #shutDown} methods, each * which run in a executor which by default uses a separate thread * for each method. * * @author Chris Nokleberg * @since 1.0 */
